name: Now Contact Label Template
summary: Learn about .LBL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Now Contact Label Template LBL files can only be opened with Now Contact. To create an LBL file with Now Contact, select Define → Print Templates → Labels..., select the "+" button in the top-right, name the template, and click OK. You will then be able to edit the template layout and its dimensions. Click OK when you're finished.
To select the template you want to print from, select File → Print Templates..., select your template from the "Template Type" dropdown menu, and click OK.
